WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr isn't for pre-level capped characters
WorkItem.Description: I'm capped at 70 - no wrath yet, and will be doing BC raids/instances for a while.  I downloaded your program and am having issues trying to filter out everything but BC gear.  When I use the BC filter, it's only displaying gear that I am currently wearing.  No upgrades.  What can I do to acheive what I want to achieve here, which is to get a list of gear upgrades that doesn't include anything beyond BC raids?

Comments.Message: Rawr doesn't support pre-level capped characters. You can use it, but it'll be terribly inaccurate. It doesn't include any BC gear by default, but you can add any that you want.
